description: This quick and easy bruschetta makes a tasty, instant brunch, or a simple snack at any time of the day.
name: Spicy Chorizo & Cherry Tomato Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g chorizo, casing removed, cut into 1cm ( 1 / 2 in) cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large, non-stick frying pan. Add the tomatoes and fry for 2 minutes, until they begin to cook.
Add the chorizo and continue to cook for 2-3 minutes, until the tomatoes begin to break down and the chorizo colours. Season well and add the balsamic vinegar.
Toast or grill the ciabatta bread. When the chorizo mixture is ready, take it off the heat, mix in the basil, and serve it piled on top of the bruschetta.
